remarks: Continuity of scalar multiplication; analogue of ~ cnmpt12f which cannot be used directly because ` .s ` is not a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
statement:
tlmtrg.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.

cnmpt1vsca.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. TopMod ) $.
cnmpt1vsca.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.

cnmpt1vsca.b $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> B ) e. ( L Cn J ) ) $.
cnmpt1vsca $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> ( A .x. B ) ) e. ( L Cn J ) ) $.
